Utilities#

nefertem.frictionless_schema_converter#

nefertem.plugins.utils.frictionless_utils.frictionless_schema_converter(schema: Union[dict, Schema], resource_name: str) → List[ConstraintFrictionless]#

Convert a frictionless schema in a list of ConstraintFrictionless.

Parameters:
schemaUnion[dict, Schema]

A valid frictionless Resource table schema.

resource_namestr

Name of the resource.

Returns:
List[ConstraintFrictionless]

A list of ConstraintFrictionless.
